item.sophisticatedbackpacks.identificati: Automatically identifies unidentified items that enter the backpack. Shift-right click to set owner.
item.sophisticatedstorage.identification: Automatically identifies unidentified items that enter the storage. Shift-right click to set owner.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.activator_up: Uses Treasure Keys from backpack inventory to open Treasure Doors when right-clicking them.
